--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Jim Dixon <jdd@d...> wrote:
> 
> Can we return to JUnit and the thrill of unit testing?

Certainly one can. 

There seems to be some agreement in the thread, around "use as few 
comments as necessary and no fewer."

There seems to be some disagreement, far less specific, around how 
many that might be.

I suspect that there's some sharing and learning that might help 
someone learn something. One way to do that would be to present a 
little code that one thinks is down to minimum comments, and see what 
others can do with it to make it need fewer.

This may not be the forum for that. If so, then without getting down 
to cases, I think I'm with Jim on letting the thread die, even though 
I do get the sense that there's something to be learned here.

Regards,
